DataElement.preferredName: Image Series Protocol Name 64 Character Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text which defines a users description of the conditions under which the (imaging) Series was performed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: User-defined description of the conditions under which the (imaging) Series was performed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.:A number of things or events standing or succeeding in order, and connected by a like relation. (from On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.
A group or succession of objects, substances, or events arranged in regular order in space or time, connected by a like relation, or forming a kind of chain.

Property.preferredDefinition: A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:The words or language units by which a thing is known.

Concepts.definition: A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
The words or language units by which a thing is known.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Events, people, materials and activities uniquely defined by medical imaging.
ConceptualDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine

DataElementConcept.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 6/19/09 created to reflect change to Image Series OC (2436196) per VCDE NCIA interim report.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: LO: A 64-character string with leading or trailing spaces being non-significant; NO CONTROL characters. [Standard-based]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).:Text; the words of something written.

Concepts.definition: An expression consisting of a linear sequence of symbols (characters or words or phrases).

ValueDomain.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/30/13 added DICOM RT CSI. jc 3/16/09 - set min length from 0 to 1. 2007 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6 2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 5 & 6

DataElement.origin: DICOM:Digital Imaging and Communications in Medicine
DataElement.changeDescription: 6/19/09 created to reflect change to Image Series OC (2436196) per VCDE NCIA interim report.  12/15/08 - during release process, system generated def replaced DICOM Standard def; pref def correct to DICOM Def.  12/9/08 - released post VCDE Interim Silver Review changes.  6/25/07 -CDE versioned to support DICOM CDE IE - DICOM Attribute-DICOM VR Rep term format.;  1/4/07-2006 DICOM Standard - Sections 3, 5 & 6;  CDE supports DICOM Standard PS 3 - 2004.
